page.title: 05BAMFORD REC.I985.
page.content: THE ANNUAL GENERAL MEETING OF THE REC WAS HELD AT THE INSTITUTE ON THE 22ND OF MAY 1985.THE CHAIRMAN,MR.J.E. COCKING,GAVE THE FOLLOWING REPORT. "THE YEAR UNDER REVIEW HAS BEEN A RELATIVELY QUIET ONE BUT THE MANAGEMENT COMMITTEE HAS BEEN LOOKING INTO THE FUTURE AND PLANNING AHEAD, SO AS TO MAKE THE BEST USE OF THE RECREATION GROUND.SMALL ,BUT USEFUL IMPROVEMENTS TO THE GROUND HAVE BEEN MADE, NOTABLY THE NEW CARPARK, IN THE N.W. CORNER OF THE GROUND. THE SIDE CUTTING GRASS MOWER WE OBTAINED HAS PROVED VERY USEFUL AND CAPABLE OF OPERATING EVEN WHEN SMALL STONES ARE PRESENT. EXTRACT FROM THE VILLAGE MAGAZINE BY FIONA JACKSON.
